headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin to communicate with Legrand LC7001. (RFLC, Adorne, and On-Q)
footerDisplay: Configure your LC7001 using the Legrand Lighting Control app. The names you give your light switches and dimmers are treated as unique indentifiers. If you rename any object in the Legrand Lighting Control app, the accessory will be removed from HomeKit and readded under the new name. You can rename the lights as much as you want within HomeKit, just not within the Legrand Lighting Control app.

name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as it will appear in logs.

lc7001-hostname.title: Hostname
lc7001-hostname.description: Hostname/IP address of LC7001 device. The default ("LCM1.local") is an mDNS hostname the LC7001 device will answer.

lc7001-port.title: Port
lc7001-port.description: TCP port of LC7001 device. Default is 2112.
